name: UseRubyVersion
description: Retrieves the specified version of Ruby from the tool cache. Optionally add it to PATH.
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: versionSpec
inputs.label: Version spec
inputs.helpMarkDown: Version range or exact version of a Ruby version to use.

inputs.name: outputVariable
inputs.label: Output variable
inputs.helpMarkDown: Set a name for the variable that will contain the directory of the decompressed Ruby distribution. Use this in subsequent tasks to access this installation of Ruby.

inputs.name: addToPath
inputs.label: Add to PATH
inputs.helpMarkDown: Prepend the retrieved Ruby version to the PATH environment variable to make it available in subsequent tasks or scripts without using the output variable.

messages.VersionNotFound: Version spec %s did not match any version in the tool cache.
